item.title: Fedora Contributor
item.description: I just started so I am still reading the documentation but I am already part of Fedora Mexico

item.title: Coffee Lover
item.description: I really love coffee so in order to know how to recognize a really good cofee, I took a course as Barista. I learned all fundamental espresso and coffee making skills, and how to prepare all the popular coffee house drinks to the highest standard. Since then I put my new knowledge to work with my new shop and espresso machine. And I stopped buying most popular coffee brandings instead I know get handcrafted coffee like Menamoro

item.title: Queer Development Group Co-Founder
item.description: Queer Development (under construction) Since 06/25/2020 This year a couple of friends of mine decided to start a group to become a community of people interested in the Information Technologies, so the idea is to invite any people who would like to learn or share their knowledge about the Software world. Also the purpose of this group is to share other developers how to create software that makes people of the LGBTQ+ community more inclusive.

item.title: Boy Scout Memeber
item.description: I was boy scout memeber of the ASMAC since 1998 to 2017. On my last years I was part of the team who is responsible of the children from 7 to 11 years old, so I really had a goo time playing with them. So I also like altruistic activities.
